WorkItem.Description: Thanks again. I have been testing it and it seems to work but with jQuery mobile, it actually does show the slider and the stars. So I had to put a  around the slider and hide it. has this bug been reported before?

Comments.Message:
Not a rateit bug. Needs to add data-role="none" to input element, so that jQuery mobile doesn't enhance it:


Â 


input type="range" id="test" data-role="none" max="5"/>


div class="rateit" data-rateit-backingfld="#test">div>
